comment: Smart Data Models - PFVArType2IEEEPFController adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/PFVArType2IEEEPFController/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE PF Controller Type 2 which is a summing point type controller and makes up the outside loop of a two-loop system. This controller is implemented as a slow PI type controller. The voltage regulator forms the inner loop and is implemented as a fast controller.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 11.4.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: exlon
contents.comment: Overexcitation or under excitation flag () true = 1 (not in the overexcitation or underexcitation state, integral action is active) false = 0 (in the overexcitation or underexcitation state, so integral action is disabled to allow the limiter to play its role). Default: False

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Integral gain of the pf controller ().  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Proportional gain of the pf controller ().  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: vclmt
contents.comment: Maximum output of the pf controller ().  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)
